\u2022 Eligibility:
Loading please wait... \u2022 Achieves highest Client Satisfaction Numbers. \u2022 For addressing all client queries efficiently, achieving customer delight through patience, alertness and no doubt the adeptness in the field. \u2022 Handles all transactions efficiently.\n\u2022 Handles vendors/clients, striking most beneficial deals for the company inclusive of dealings with Burbank Group of Companies. \u2022 Within a short span shows potential growth. \u2022 Demonstrates professional behaviour through willingness to cooperate, work, and communicate with others in the workplace.\n\u2022 Not just restricts himself/herself to the work assigned but when required is ready to go the extra mile, do the Above and Beyond. \u2022 Successfully exceeds the goals.\n\u2022 Shows prospects of being a value add to the team and organisation. \u2022 Has always being consistently performing par excellence, not restricting himself/herself to one role.\n\u2022 Displays initiative and excellence in performing core job requirements.\n\u2022 Best exemplifies the Companys mission. \u2022 Fosters an atmosphere of collaboration and creativity, which contributes to the efficiency and effectiveness of productivity.\n\u2022 Demonstrates leadership qualities by effectively managing their staff, service, system or work.\n\u2022 Leads changes or improvements for the benefit of their peers.\n\u2022 Inspires and motivates others to take advantage of opportunities that enhance their professional or personal lives.\n\u2022 Empowers others to achieve results in support of their team. \u2022 Shows the Highest Growth - in terms of numbers, business/ revenue generating, increase in projects, achieving highest level of client satisfaction.\n\u2022 Demonstrates/ upholds all the company policies ensuring a constructive and positive work environment. \u2022 Developed an effective solution to a problem in a productive manner or improved a solutions overall effectiveness through a new method or approach.\n\u2022 Developed and implemented a plan that benefits the team/department and thereby the organisation.\n\u2022 Generated valuable ideas that have helped to develop new or improved processes, methods, systems, programs, or services for their team, department, or the organisation.\n\u2022 Who brings in a change within the system to increase the efficiency and sustainability of the system. \u2022 Takes initiative to improve the bottom line of the business by ushering into new business verticals. \u2022 Creates a design/UI that projects originality and excellence. \u2022 Proposes, develops a business idea/plan/strategy and takes it to the market, generating revenue and covering a client base of 100. Search By Employee Name \nOr\n Search By Department No Results Found
\u2022 Nominations once submitted, cannot for any reason be withdrawn.\n\u2022 Nominations that either do not meet the award criteria, or are not in compliance with the procedures listed above will be considered INVALID.\n\u2022 Nominees for the awards will be judged on the basis of their performance in advancing the organisation toward its goals.\n\u2022 The decision taken by the nominated Panel prevails under any given scenario.
\u2022 Nominations once submitted, cannot for any reason be withdrawn.\n\u2022 Nominations that either do not meet the award criteria, or are not in compliance with the procedures listed above will be considered INVALID.
Milestone 2020 is the annual event celebrated at Digital Minds. Celebrated in March, it is a gathering to applaud and cheer ourselves for the efforts we put each day.\nIn order to honour outstanding employees, Digital Minds has introduced the Milestone Awards. Milestone 2020 is the annual event celebrated at Digital Minds in month of March. Informal Awards are Fun Awards to recognize few of our colleagues with their regular habits
